title: Was Anubis a god of magic as well as death? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not really, magic was more the domain of Isis. Anubis’ main job was judging the souls of the dead. This was accomplished by weighing the recently deceased's heart against a feather. If the heart was lighter, they could enter the afterlife. If not, they were devoured by Ammit, a part-crocodile, part-lion, part-hippo monster.

The Kemets did not refer to them as “gods", Nejer meant “power", and each one wore a mask of the animal associated with a specific power. Anubis assisted Osiris, he was the son of Osiris and Nepthys. Anubis is also the finder of lost objects, call on him when you misplace or lose an item. The Nejers of magic are Isis, and Hekt, a lesser known one, whom is depicted as a frog.
